answerText: Leon Black[10] Leon is a character on this HBO comedy , in which Larry David plays Larry David. Its seventh season revolved around a plot to win back Larry's wife Cheryl by staging a reunion episode of Seinfeld.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Dartmouth A + WUSTL | 14 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This character drives his friend's Prius from Los Angeles to New York. For 10 points each: [10] Name this hurricane victim, portrayed by J.B. Smoove, who remains behind at Larry David's house after the rest of the Black family returns home.
